headline.main: Piet Hein Eek Brings His Singular Furniture — and a Couple of Friends — to NoHo

snippet: The Dutch designer collaborated with the gallery the Future Perfect on a takeover of the storefront, featuring his own work and that of his compatriots.
abstract: The Dutch designer collaborated with the gallery the Future Perfect on a takeover of the storefront, featuring his own work and that of his compatriots.
